room_title: Escape room "​The Grimm Forest" by Lock & Key Escape Room in Buffalo
room_description:
Tales are often told of the dangers in the Grimm Forest. Goblins, wolves, trolls and worse are said to stalk it at night.  You have been captured by the worst of them, the evil Witch of Wood.

​She's left her cottage to prepare her next meal... You!  You'll need to race against time to escape her abode and through the forest before she returns!

Inspired by the fairy tales of the Grimm Brothers.
